doc.name: mobilePreferredLanguages
doc.summary: Returns a return-delimited list of standard language tags in order of user preference.

example.p: answer "The user prefers" && line 1 of tLanguages

description.value:
The mobilePreferredLanguages function returns a list of language tags in order of user preference, highest first, one per line.
For example:
EN
FR
DE
description.comments:
Use mobilePreferredLanguages to get a list of preferred user languages.
On Android, the mobilePreferredLanguages function returns one language that is currently in use. This is because Android does not support a list of preferred languages.
